publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4399 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates St Patrick’s FP football club from Dumbarton on winning the Scottish Amateur Cup at Hampden Park against Falkirk Amateurs; notes the wonderful achievement in winning this trophy for only the third time in its history; pays tribute to both managers, Tam Ferry and Tommy Graham, for guiding the club over the last year, and wishes St Patrick’s FP every success for the season ahead.
S2M-4399 Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club (lodged on 15 May 2006) Mr Frank McAveety*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Des McNulty*
S2M-4399 Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club (lodged on 15 May 2006) Bill Butler*, Karen Gillon*, Trish Godman*

S2M-4399 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates St Patrick’s FP football club from Dumbarton on winning the Scottish Amateur Cup at Hampden Park against Falkirk Amateurs; notes the wonderful achievement in winning this trophy for only the third time in its history; pays tribute to both managers, Tam Ferry and Tommy Graham, for guiding the club over the last year, and wishes St Patrick’s FP every success for the season ahead. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety, Dr Elaine Murray, Des McNulty, Bill Butler, Karen Gillon, Trish Godman
S2M-4399 Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club (lodged on 15 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4399 Congratulations to St Patrick’s FP Football Club (lodged on 15 May 2006) Murray Tosh*
